meanings.definition: A promotional letter or advertisement sent by mail to a large number of people.
meanings.sent1: I received a mailshot offering a discount on new shoes.
meanings.sent2: The company sent out a mailshot to announce their upcoming sale.
meanings.sent3: The mailshot about the new restaurant made me hungry!
meanings.sent4: Her inbox was flooded with mailshots, like a sea of advertisements.
meanings.sent5: The colorful mailshot caught my eye immediately.
